creditline: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. George William Knabe, Jr.
description: image of three Native Americans with wrinkled faces; figure at left holds a drum and wears a maroon shirt with white, yellow, red and turquoise stripes, and a choker with a medallion at the front; central figure in profile wears a white blanket with blue and orange stripes; figure in ULC wears orange; lavender and orange triangles and lines at top; slightly abstracted style; black strip frame
signed: LRC in purple: PENN \'71 | on back in black: B. PENN
title: [Title unknown]
